channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Fight Laugh Feast Conference - Reflections From The Rebels [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: Pastors Nate & Chris, The Rebels, have returned from the Fight Laugh Feast conference held at the Ark Encounter.  In this episode they give you their thoughts on not only the conference, but the Ark as well.  Were they excited to be there?  I think so.
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: Another Rebels Second Listen! A Dr. Joe Boot Review [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: With the Rebels back home recouperating from the Fight Laugh Feast Conference at the Ark Encounter,  Dave the knobs & dials guy presents another look back almost six years to Rebels episode #42 where they discussed the teaching presented the week previous by Dr. Joe Boot.  Definitely worth a second listen!  You can communicate with the Rebels via email at rebelpodcastflf@gmail.com.
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
